modules.name: Content Quality
modules.description: Evaluates depth, accuracy, and comprehensiveness of content
insights: Strong content quality with good depth

issues.message: Some help articles could be more detailed

recommendations.title: Enhance help documentation
recommendations.description: Add more detail to 4 help articles
actionItems: Expand help articles with step-by-step guides
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 3-5 point increase in Content Quality score

modules.name: E-E-A-T Signals
modules.description: Expertise, Experience, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness indicators

issues.message: 15% of content pages lack author attribution

recommendations.title: Complete author attribution
recommendations.description: Add author bylines to remaining 6 pages
actionItems: Ensure all content has proper attribution
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 2-4 point increase in E-E-A-T score
